name:
Resident Evil™
The Mercenaries 3D
description:
It’s a race against time as players
compete to defeat as many enemies
as possible before the countdown
reaches zero.


Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D
offers players a variety of gameplay
formats with a solo mission option or
the ability to team up with others
across the world in two-player co-op
via Internet Play. The game also
includes the addition of an all new
Skill Slot feature. Players will be able
to fill three skill slots from a selection
of 30 skills including improvements to
weapon performance, reload speed or
melee abilities and customise
characters to best suit their style of
play.
